headline: Cantor Fitzgerald Initiates Coverage of Microchip Technology (MCHP) Stock, Gives Neutral
summary: Microchip Technology Incorporated (NASDAQ:MCHP) is one of the 10 Worst Aggressive Growth Stocks to Buy According to Short Sellers. On June 18, Cantor Fitzgerald analyst Matthew Prisco began coverage of Microchip Technology Incorporated (NASDAQ:MCHP)’s stock with a “Neutral” rating and a price objective of $70. The firm highlighted the positive developments in the company’s efforts to improve […]
